data.title: A Main + A Tree Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary Combo
data.description: Use Sky Smokes to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through these key choke points into A Site.

data.title: Early Round A Main Sky Smoke to Contest Space
data.description: Use this early round A Main Sky + Molly combo to contest space in A Main.

data.title: Deep B Main Control Sky Smoke
data.description: Use this typically at the beginning of the round to make it more difficult for enemy players to take space in B Main.

data.title: B Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective, B Site chokepoint delay setup.

data.title: C Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Molly
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective C Site chokepoint delay setup.
